vulnerability.name: USN-4015-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4015-1 fixed a vulnerability in DBus. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Joe Vennix discovered that DBus incorrectly handled DBUS_COOKIE_SHA1  authentication. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass  authentication and connect to DBus servers with elevated privileges.

statements.status_notes: DBus could allow unintended access to services. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
